captions.text:
I just wanna say guys, that I appreciate
how forgiving and accepting
No problem, Mr. President, sir. We all know you were just confused.

You can say that again! I mean I
left you all to get electrocuted to

death while I went out to freeze the world
to serve me.
I mean, that's pretty messed up.

that's okay because you had a change of
heart before doing all those things.
I so appreciate that. I mean you're willing to overlook that I

imprisoned and tortured dozens of Master
Builders for almost ten years.

In addition to blowing up Uni-Kitty's
home and

Not to mention, you blinded and
murdered me.
I've changed... that makes everything better.
